content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia. Thank you for your interest in my apartment. Let's discuss the rental price. What is your budget for the monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 500 euros per month. Can you tell me more about the apartment? What is the location? Is it furnished or unfurnished?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Certainly, Emilia. The apartment is located in the heart of Munich, close to public transportation, shops, and restaurants. It is 25 square meters in size and is unfurnished.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Hmm, I see. Can we negotiate on the rental price? I am willing to pay more than 500 euros per month if you can lower the rent for me.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Of course, Emilia. Negotiation is always possible. What is your maximum budget for the monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine
